definition: Edison Chen (1980-), Hong Kong singer and actor
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
hat/crown/crest/cap
surname Guan
to hope/to admire/variant of 稀[xi1]

sentences.english: But Chen has since made an apology.
sentences.chinese: 但是陈冠希已经做出道歉。

sentences.english: Edison Chan with the Hongkong film" Gen-X cops II" makes Hongkong person know.
sentences.chinese: 陈冠希与香港电影《特警新人类”让香港人知道。

sentences.english: He said he thought he had deleted the images from the computer.
sentences.chinese: 陈冠希表示自己以为已经把那些照片都删了。

sentences.english: D. Edison Chen is a goddamned rich philanderer.
sentences.chinese: 陈冠希是一个有钱的花心大萝卜。
陈冠希说，“人生很漫长，人也会改变。

sentences.english: Hong Kong actor Edison Chen had become famous, but it comes at a price.
sentences.chinese: 香港艺人陈冠希出名了，但是他也为此付出了代价。
